# Where can I see the filter's settings?

1.  Hover in the right corner of the dashboard element.
2.  Click ![Capture filter icon inactive](/data:image/png;base64,).
3.  A window will open on the right side of the screen where you can find information about filters: **Time period** and **Dimensions**.

The defined time period is displayed at all times under the element's title.

**See also:** 
![](/data:image/png;base64,) [Filter data in elements]( https://github.com/alinbogdan/ContDocumentation/blob/master/translations/en/online-help/filter-data-in-elements-task.md)
